headline: Dollar General Just Raised a Huge Red Flag About the State of the Economy. What Does It Mean for Investors?
summary: One retailer that focuses on offering value to discount shoppers is Dollar General (NYSE: DG).  A struggling consumer is nothing new for Dollar General.  CEO Todd Vasos says that it's not just that consumers are cutting back on discretionary spending, but that they "only have enough money for basic essentials."
